attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned wish to save the beautiful Victorian Pier in Colwyn Bay for future generations to come, to attempt to restore it to its former glory as part of the regeneration of Colwyn Bay using the regeneration funds which have been granted by the welsh assembly and government

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
